title: Luguru (Karugu) Gospel of Matthew
title_vernacular: Luguru Injili ya Mathayo (Gospel of Matthew)
description: Nsachilo nswamu kwa Mattayo kwa nonga ya Kaguru

language.name: Luguru
language.area: Morogoro region, Morogoro and Kilosa districts; Pwani region, Bagamoyo District, Luguru Mountains, and Dar-es-Salaam.
